summary: A spoiled young rich girl is forced by misfortune to fight for survival in the slums and alleys, where she becomes involved with all manner of unpleasantness.
cast: Mary Pickford|Ralph Lewis|Kenneth Harlan|T.D. Crittenden|Aggie Herring|Andrew Arbuckle|Max Davidson|Paul Mullen|Buddy Messinger|Nellie Anderson|Ernest Butterworth Jr.|B.A. Lewis|Lafe McKee
director: Director: Sidney Franklin (as Sidney A. Franklin)
title: The Hoodlum
